item.title: Secure Access Made Simple: Terraform-driven AWS Client VPN
item.description: AWS VPN Setup Description This repository provides a terraform code to set up an AWS infrastructure with a client VPN endpoint for accessing resources within a VPC. It creates security groups to control access and establishes network associations for private subnets. Use Cases The AWS VPN setup can be utilized in various scenarios, including: Remote Access (Bastion Alternative): Provide a secure alternative to a bastion by enabling authorized users to securely connect to AWS resources through a virtual private network (VPN) from remote locations.

item.title: About Us
item.description: We are a rapidly growing Software development organization. Our team has the necessary expertise, zeal, and dedication, and we have helped a number of businesses achieve success and great performance. We are an organization founded and run by Developers.
